revised_title: Anatomy of the Skin: Observations on Connective Tissue Bundles and Fibers
tldr: The author investigates the structure of the skin, specifically the connective tissue bundles and fibers, using maceration techniques and microscopy. They describe the primary, secondary, and tertiary bundles and their dimensions, as well as the isolation and examination of elastic fibers. This research contributes to a better understanding of the skin's anatomy and histology.
